data.text: Hotel was really good, food have more choices, drinks so perfect. Hotel have more activities. All the staff very very good and friendly. And all staff work hard. Kikoa club brilliant for children they really happy here. And we had enjoy in the Swimming pools and waterpark !
data.title: Holiday

data.text:
Very enjoyable week. Room was very comfortable, excellent stock of complimentary toiletries and minibar, robe and slippers. Staff all very friendly and helpful. Good range of food in main restaurant buffet and was very tasty, although not a huge variety across the week. We didn't try the al a carte restaurants, but there is a choice if you want to change it up. Lunch time restaurants also open at the beach amd several patisserie stands ipen throughout the day for sweet snacks and icecream.

Highlights
- Kikoa Kids club is fantastic! 9.30am-midnight, supervised activities for kids of all ages. You can sign children in if you want or the older ones can come and go as they please, almost like a youth club. Lots of great modern facilities including music studio, art studio, play station room and soft play.
- Lovely coffee hut open through the morning for delicious iced coffees.
- Pool side and beach cabanas (approx. £110 per day) worth the extra for a treat. Very comfortable, excellent service all day long (cut fruit in the mornings, lunch menus brought to you, and cakes and ice cream in the afternoon)
- Variety of pool areas mean you can sit in different places every day for a different experience (eg the smaller pools in the trees are much quieter and more relaxing, while the main pool is closest to aqua park for the kids.

Downsides 
- sun loungers nabbed pretty early, even though we were here early in the season. I imagine this only gets worse as the season gets going
- Evening entertainment pretty limited, but this may be due to it only being start of the season (for example, they didn't open the main amphitheatre while we were here)
- watch out for jellyfish in the sea! Didn't hear of anyone being stung while we were here, but it meant swimming/paddling in the sea was limited, as we saw quite a few
data.title: Great option for family friendly all inclusive

data.text: Amazing hotel. Super friendly and clean. The staff are so friendly. The hotel offers plenty for everyone. Plenty for kids. Pool area is amazing and clean. Food is fantastic. We have really enjoyed our stay and booked for next year and can't wait
data.title: Amazing hotel

data.text: We are here long long time in this hotel we always love to be here all staff is amazing from bar till cleaners all of them smile face and take care about you also entertainment they are so friendly and smile face always every time they inviting you to activities and making your holiday much better I wanna say specially thank you to furkan from entertainment he is so lovely and funny person and thanks to Titanic family they are always the best
data.title: Like always the best

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your heartfelt review. We are delighted to hear that you have enjoyed your time at Titanic Deluxe Lara Hotel and that our staff, from the bar to the cleaners, have contributed to making your stay memorable. It brings us great joy to know that you appreciate the friendly and attentive service provided by our team.

We are especially grateful for your kind words about Furkan from our entertainment team. He will be thrilled to hear your feedback. At Titanic Deluxe Lara, we strive to create unforgettable experiences for our guests, and we are thrilled to hear that we have succeeded in doing so for you.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more enjoyable stays in the future.

Best regards,
The Titanic Deluxe Lara Hotel Team
owner_response.author: Mina DARABİ  DARABI

data.text:
We visited in April on Easter Monday , having been to Turkey previously we expected this hotel to be as good as we have stayed at before. 
The Titanic Deluxe has everything you could imagine.. from pools and waterslides to beach promenade and cabanas..

Service was 5 star in every department … especially around the pool and bar areas.. 
immaculately clean and very efficient in every way.. 
The All inclusive restaurants near the beach were an added extra but made massive difference.. 
food , service and hospitality was excellent..

We are already booking for 2025
You won’t be disappointed red with the Titanic Deluxe Lara Beach
data.title: Easter Family trip 2024

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are thrilled to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us during your visit in April, especially on Easter Monday. It's delightful to know that you found our hotel to meet your expectations and that you appreciated the various amenities we offer, from pools and waterslides to beach promenades and cabanas.

We are particularly pleased to hear that you found our service to be exceptional in every department, especially around the pool and bar areas. Maintaining cleanliness and providing efficient service are top priorities for us, and we are glad that you noticed our efforts in this regard.

It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed the All-Inclusive restaurants near the beach and that they made a significant difference to your experience. We strive to provide excellent food, service, and hospitality to all our guests, and we are delighted that we could exceed your expectations in these aspects.

Thank you for your loyalty and for already booking your stay with us for 2025. We are excited to welcome you back and to continue providing you with unforgettable experiences at Titanic Deluxe Lara Beach. You won't be disappointed!

Best regards,
The Titanic Deluxe Lara Beach Team
owner_response.author: Mina DARABİ  DARABI
